alert.note: Alert for Horry; Marion (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 30 at 10:58PM EDT until further notice by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...Forecast flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in South Carolina... Little Pee Dee River At Galivants Ferry affecting Horry and Marion Counties. Great Pee Dee River At Pee Dee affecting Marion and Florence Counties. Black River at Kingstree affecting Williamsburg County. For the Little Pee Dee River...including Galivants Ferry...Moderate flooding is forecast. For the Great Pee Dee River...including Bennettsville 10sw, Pee Dee...Moderate flooding is forecast. For the Black Creek...including Black Creek Nr Hartsville, Quinby... Major flooding is forecast. For the Black River...including Kingstree...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Little Pee Dee River at Galivants Ferry. * WHEN...From Thursday afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Flood waters will continue to rise in the Fork Retch community located near Nichols. Flood waters will begin to affect some homes at Fork Retch. Swampland flooding will increase. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 PM EDT Wednesday the stage was 4.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow afternoon and continue rising to a crest of 11.9 feet Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=ilm . The next statement will be issued by Thursday afternoon.
